definition: to lay a foundation (also fig.)/to make a first sketch/to eat sth before drinking/to apply an undercoat
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: If a heavy base layer is to be worn under it, going up a size might be warranted.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要穿厚的打底衫，買大一號會比較合適。

sentences.english: This construction involves the vertical needling of a fibrous web (batt) onto a woven base fabric.
sentences.chinese: 這個結構涉及的在羊毛打底上的纖維網垂直針刺。

sentences.english: The second image is close to what is called a underpainting.
sentences.chinese: 第二個圖像是貼近被稱爲打底。

sentences.english: Backing welding is once completed a full circle and there is only one welding joint.
sentences.chinese: 打底焊整圈一次完成，所焊焊道只有一個接頭。

sentences.english: The paper provides several substrate plating technologies of zinc alloy cast piecework to substitute cyanide copper plating.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了幾種取代氰化鍍銅的鋅合金電鍍打底工藝。

sentences.english: To the next morning, before rendering can make use of the cream to make.
sentences.chinese: 到了次日清晨，可用化妝前打底用的面霜來化妝。

sentences.english: The wall was first pricked up with a coat lime.
sentences.chinese: 牆壁先抹上一層石灰打底子。

sentences.english: Two-components PU, high solid content, for base use, water resistance and good workability .
sentences.chinese: 二液型，高固型份，打底用，耐水壓，加工性優。

sentences.english: The first task is to extend the underpainting using oils.
sentences.chinese: 第一項任務是將打底用的油。

sentences.english: Basic flux-cored wire for backing weld to T91 tube was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用於T91鋼管打底焊的鹼性渣系藥芯焊絲。

definition: to pair up/to match/to arrange in pairs/to add sth into a group
to smudge (become smeared)/to smudge (create a blurred effect)/shading (wash painting technique)
variant of 顯擺|显摆[xian3 bai5]
to add the finishing touch (abbr. for 畫龍點睛|画龙点睛[hua4 long2 dian3 jing1])
